info.name: Product API Collection
info.description:
The project supports such data as Categories,Products, Cart, etc.The project has API authorization, in most cases it is provided for terminals. Also in the project,there is an Administrator panel, where all the necessary tools for data control are located.

Contact Support:
 Email: info@algorithm.am
